headline: Mizuho Raises Block (XYZ) Price Target, Keeps Outperform Rating
summary: Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) is one of the 11 Best Under-the-Radar Stocks to Buy Right Now. On August 14, Mizuho increased the price target for Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) from $71 to $88 while keeping an Outperform rating. Mizuho highlighted that Block, Inc.’s (NYSE:XYZ) Square is seeing improvement in its point-of-sale (POS) volumes and its relative market […]

headline: Jack Dorsey wants to make Bitcoin mining as reusable as SpaceX rockets
summary: Jack Dorsey’s Block is launching Proto Rig and Proto Fleet to make Bitcoin mining machines reusable, upgradable, and more efficient, drawing parallels to SpaceX’s game-changing reusable rockets.

raw.headline: Jack Dorsey wants to make Bitcoin mining as reusable as SpaceX rockets

headline: BAC, JPM & COF-Owned Zelle App Faces Lawsuit Over Security Lapse
summary: Bank of America, JPMorgan and Capital One's Zelle faces a New York lawsuit alleging $1B theft from weak fraud safeguards.
